mapper.select: select t4.deposit deposit from rental_room t1 left join rental_tenant t2 on t1.id = t2.room_id left join rental_bill_tenant_relevance t3 on t3.tenant_id = t2.id left join rental_bill t4 on t3.bill_id = t4.id where t4.type = 'CHECK_IN' and t2.status = 'LIVING' and t1.id = #{roomId} limit 1
